kgcnn.data.mutagen package¶

Submodules¶

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutag module¶

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutag.mutag_download_dataset(path, overwrite=False)¶

Download Mutag as zip-file.

Parameters

  • datadir – (str) filepath if empty use user-default path

  • overwrite – (bool) overwrite existing database, default:False

Returns

Filepath

Return type

os.path

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutag.mutag_extract_dataset(path, load=False)¶

Extract Mutagenicity.zip zip-file.

Parameters

  • datadir – (str) filepath if empty use user-default path

  • overwrite – (bool) overwrite existing database, default:False

Returns

Filepath

Return type

os.path

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutag.mutag_graph()¶

Get MUTAG dataset.

Returns

[labels, nodes, edge_indices, edges]

  • labels (np.array): Labels.

  • nodes (list): Node features.

  • edge_indices (list): List of edge indices of connections per molecule.

  • edges (list): List of edge features

Return type

list

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutag.mutag_load(path)¶

Load, convert MUTAG dataset.

Parameters

path (str) – Filepath to database.

Returns

[labels, nodes, edge_indices, edges]

  • labels (np.array): Labels.

  • nodes (list): Node features.

  • edge_indices (list): List of edge indices of connections per molecule.

  • edges (list): List of edge features

Return type

list

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutagenicity module¶

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutagenicity.mutagenicity_download_dataset(path, overwrite=False)¶

Download Mutagenicity as zip-file.

Parameters

  • datadir – (str) filepath if empty use user-default path

  • overwrite – (bool) overwrite existing database, default:False

Returns

Filepath

Return type

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutagenicity.mutagenicity_extract_dataset(path, load=False)¶

Extract Mutagenicity.zip zip-file.

Parameters

  • datadir – (str) filepath if empty use user-default path

  • overwrite – (bool) overwrite existing database, default:False

Returns

Filepath

Return type

os.path

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutagenicity.mutagenicity_graph()¶

Generate list of mutagenicity graphs.

Returns

[labels, nodes, edge_indices, edges, atoms]

  • labels (list): Mutagenity label (0,1).

  • nodes (list): Atoms as Atomnumber array.

  • edge_indices (list): Bond indices (i,j).

  • edges (list): Bond type.

  • atoms (list): Atom list as string.

Return type

ist

kgcnn.data.mutagen.mutagenicity.mutagenicity_load(path)¶

Load Mutagenicity dataset as list.

Parameters

path (str) – path location.

Returns

[labels, nodes, edge_indices, edges, atoms]

  • labels (list): Mutagenity label (0,1).

  • nodes (list): Atoms as Atomnumber array.

  • edge_indices (list): Bond indices (i,j).

  • edges (list): Bond type.

  • atoms (list): Atom list as string.

Return type

list
